issue.title: [Release] Don't consider rust tarballs when cleaning up old releases
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13475](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13475). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
After uploading the source release to apache svn I realized that all of the earlier arrow releases were removed. 
Since we ship rust tarballs separately the regex pattern filtered out all previous apache/arrow releases.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13475?focusedCommentId=17389067) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10819
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10819>
